name: Rachel De Grandmaison MANUEL, Appellant, v. BUREAU OF CHILDREN'S SERVICES, BRADFORD COUNTY
name_abbreviation: Manuel v. Bureau of Children's Services

judges: Beforce O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Rachel De Grandmaison MANUEL, Appellant, v. BUREAU OF CHILDREN’S SERVICES, BRADFORD COUNTY.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Bradford County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jonathan P. Foster, Athens, for appellant.
Evan S. Williams, Jr., Troy, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 748
Rachel De Grandmaison MANUEL, Appellant, v. BUREAU OF CHILDREN’S SERVICES, BRADFORD COUNTY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Jonathan P. Foster, Athens, for appellant.
Evan S. Williams, Jr., Troy, for appellee.
Beforce O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
